mutants.code:
def minimum_holes_to_block(n, A, B, sizes):
    first_hole_size = sizes[0]
    remaining_sizes = sizes[1:]
    remaining_sizes.sort(reverse=True)
    total_size = sum(remaining_sizes) - first_hole_size
    holes_to_block = 0
    required_flow = A * first_hole_size
    while required_flow / total_size < B:
        total_size -= remaining_sizes[holes_to_block]
        holes_to_block += 1
    return holes_to_block

        total_size -= remaining_sizes[holes_to_block]
